QuestData.Title: The Abyssal Ride
QuestData.Description: If you are going to be making it anywhere in this kelp forest, we need to get you a reliable mount. I think I've come up with a better plan than the sea turtle, and it's not far.$B$BTie off a lure at the rope just west of us, and then mount the seahorse that it will attract.$B$BBe warned, you may need to work hard to break the beast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lure and subdue an Abyssal Seahorse.
QuestData.CompletionText: The grace of these creatures is astounding. They will make the perfect mounts.
QuestData.RewardText: Amazing! You look exhausted. She must have really made you work for it.$B$BLife should be a lot easier down here going forward with a mount that swift at your beckoning. Congratulations, $n!
